kizuna_math_b_01: Oh, my. If it isn’t [VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_b_03: Please forgive me if this is an...odd question.[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_b_04:
Were you perhaps watching me from afar
just now?[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_b_05:
Y-yes, I suppose you wouldn’t have been doing
something like that. I’m sorry.[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_b_06: You see... Oh, how should I put this?[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_b_07:
Recently, there have been times when I feel as if
I am being watched...[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_b_08: Not by a Pokémon, mind you, but by a person.[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_b_09:
I thought it might be a ghost, so I tried asking my
sister for help. She said it most likely isn’t one.\r
She’s good with Ghost-type Pokémon, you know.[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_b_10:
Perhaps one of my students is quietly watching
me, waiting for a chance to ask me a question?[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_b_11:
Goodness, if that wasn’t an intense gaze I felt!
If you notice someone with a sort of fire in their\r
eyes, come tell me, won’t you?[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_b_12:
If they are too shy to come ask me themselves,
then I’ll go to them![VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_b_system_01: You became even closer with Ms. Tyme!
